articles.title: Chicago Bulls' Derrick Jones Jr. exits with knee injury in loss to Brooklyn Nets - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Chicago forward Derrick Jones Jr. landed awkwardly on his right leg 36 seconds into Wednesday night's game and was ruled out due to a knee injury.
articles.content: CHICAGO -- Bulls forward Derrick Jones Jr. had to be helped to the locker room during Wednesday's 138-112 loss to the Brooklyn Nets after landing awkwardly on his right leg 36 seconds into the game.… [+961 chars]
